InitialFeedbackHistory:
03/12/2024
Ethics: please add the ethical approval number(s) for the experiments with mammalian oocytes; for the experiments with frog eggs please notify the animal Ethics Committee using the from 'Notification of replacement (4R) animal experiment (English)' that you can find on https://www.kuleuven.be/animalia/en/forms/index.html. 
Sharing: Since you mention that there are no factors that restrict or prevent the sharing of data, you can consider sharing your data via a trusted data repository such as KU Leuven RDR (https://rdr.kuleuven.be/) or EBI (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/). This approach will enhance your visibility and the impact of your data by making it accessible for reuse by others. For more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
